name: William A. Jones
title: Partner
credentials: J.D., University of Virginia School of Law, 2001
Licensed in Pennsylvania, New Jersey, and Federal Courts
Former Assistant U.S. Attorney, Eastern District of Pennsylvania
Member, National Association of Criminal Defense Lawyers
Certified in DUI Defense by the National College for DUI Defense
bio: William A. Jones brings a unique perspective to criminal defense, having served as both a federal prosecutor and defense attorney. As a former Assistant U.S. Attorney for the Eastern District of Pennsylvania, William prosecuted complex white-collar crimes and federal offenses for over eight years before transitioning to defense work. This prosecutorial experience gives him invaluable insight into how the government builds cases, allowing him to develop superior defense strategies for his clients. William specializes in white-collar criminal defense, DUI cases, and complex federal criminal matters. His dual perspective and extensive trial experience make him one of the most sought-after criminal defense attorneys in the Philadelphia area. He is certified in DUI defense and maintains active memberships in leading criminal defense organizations.
